attributes.action: to abolish nhs car parking charges as our Welsh and Scottish counterpart
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the NHS Hospitals in England charging for hospital car parking as our counterparts in Wales and Scotland have. To stop treating the English as revenue to fund culture indifference across border's we are the UNITED KINGDOM

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
